trans-unit.source: Provides a set of static (Shared in Visual Basic) methods for working with dataflow blocks.
trans-unit.target: 提供一组用于处理数据流块的静态方法（在 Visual Basic 中为共享方法）。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of data contained in the source.
trans-unit.target: 指定源中所包含的数据的类型。

trans-unit.source: The source to wrap.
trans-unit.target: 要包装的源。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.IObservable`1" /> abstraction over the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.IObservable`1" /> 创建新的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1" /> 抽象。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IObservable`1" /> that enables observers to be subscribed to the source.
trans-unit.target: 使观察者可以订阅源的 <see cref="T:System.IObservable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of input accepted by the target block.
trans-unit.target: 指定由目标块接受的输入类型。

trans-unit.source: The target to wrap.
trans-unit.target: 要包装的目标。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.IObserver`1" /> abstraction over the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 通过 <see cref="T:System.IObserver`1" /> 创建新的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> 抽象。

trans-unit.source: An observer that wraps the target block.
trans-unit.target: 包装目标块的观察者。

trans-unit.source: Specifies type of data contained in the first source.
trans-unit.target: 指定第一个源中所包含的数据的类型。

trans-unit.source: Specifies type of data contained in the second source.
trans-unit.target: 指定第二个源中所包含的数据的类型。

trans-unit.source: The first source.
trans-unit.target: 第一个源。

trans-unit.source: The handler to execute on data from the first source.
trans-unit.target: 在第一个源的数据上执行的处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The second source.
trans-unit.target: 第二个源。

trans-unit.source: The handler to execute on data from the second source.
trans-unit.target: 在第二个源的数据上执行的处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Monitors two dataflow sources, invoking the provided handler for whichever source makes data available first.
trans-unit.target: 监视两种数据流源, 调用出来程序以使无论哪一种源都可首先获得数据。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> that represents the asynchronous choice.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示异步选择的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />。

trans-unit.source: If both sources are completed prior to the choice completing, the resulting task will be canceled.
trans-unit.target: 如果在选择完成之前完成这两个源，则将取消结果任务。

trans-unit.source: When one of the sources has data available and successfully propagates it to the choice, the resulting task will complete when the handler completes; if the handler throws an exception, the task will end in the <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" /> state and will contain the unhandled exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果源的其中之一具有可利用数据并成功传播到选定内容时，则结果任务将在处理程序完成时完成；如果该处理程序引发异常，则该任务将在 <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" /> 状态下结束并将包含未经处理的异常。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the task will end with its <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1.Result" /> set to either 0 or 1 to represent the first or second source, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 否则，此任务将以其 <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1.Result" /> 设置至 0 或 1 来分别表示第一或第二源结束。

trans-unit.source: This method will only consume an element from one of the two data sources, never both.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将只使用来自两个数据源中的一个元素（不会同时使用两个）。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="source1" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source1" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="action1" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="action1" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="source2" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source2" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="action2" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="action2" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Specifies type of data contained in the first source.
trans-unit.target: 指定第一个源中所包含的数据的类型。

trans-unit.source: Specifies type of data contained in the second source.
trans-unit.target: 指定第二个源中所包含的数据的类型。

trans-unit.source: The first source.
trans-unit.target: 第一个源。

trans-unit.source: The handler to execute on data from the first source.
trans-unit.target: 在第一个源的数据上执行的处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The second source.
trans-unit.target: 第二个源。

trans-unit.source: The handler to execute on data from the second source.
trans-unit.target: 在第二个源的数据上执行的处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The options with which to configure this choice.
trans-unit.target: 用来配置此选择的选项。

trans-unit.source: Monitors two dataflow sources, invoking the provided handler for whichever source makes data available first.
trans-unit.target: 监视两种数据流源, 调用出来程序以使无论哪一种源都可首先获得数据。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> that represents the asynchronous choice.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示异步选择的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />。

trans-unit.source: If both sources are completed prior to the choice completing, or if the <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" /> provided as part of <paramref name="dataflowBlockOptions" /> is canceled prior to the choice completing, the resulting task will be canceled.
trans-unit.target: 如果在选择完成之前完成数据源，或者如果在选择完成之前作为 <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" /> 提供作为 <paramref name="dataflowBlockOptions" /> 一部分提供，则取消结果任务。

trans-unit.source: When one of the sources has data available and successfully propagates it to the choice, the resulting task will complete when the handler completes; if the handler throws an exception, the task will end in the <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" /> state and will contain the unhandled exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果源的其中之一具有可利用数据并成功传播到选定内容时，则结果任务将在处理程序完成时完成；如果该处理程序引发异常，则该任务将在 <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" /> 状态下结束并将包含未经处理的异常。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the task will end with its <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1.Result" /> set to either 0 or 1 to represent the first or second source, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 否则，此任务将以其 <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1.Result" /> 设置至 0 或 1 来分别表示第一或第二源结束。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="source1" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source1" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="action1" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="action1" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="source2" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source2" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="action2" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="action2" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="dataflowBlockOptions" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dataflowBlockOptions" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Specifies type of data contained in the first source.
trans-unit.target: 指定第一个源中所包含的数据的类型。

trans-unit.source: Specifies type of data contained in the second source.
trans-unit.target: 指定第二个源中所包含的数据的类型。

trans-unit.source: Specifies type of data contained in the third source.
trans-unit.target: 指定第三源中所包含的数据的类型。

trans-unit.source: The first source.
trans-unit.target: 第一个源。

trans-unit.source: The handler to execute on data from the first source.
trans-unit.target: 在第一个源的数据上执行的处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The second source.
trans-unit.target: 第二个源。

trans-unit.source: The handler to execute on data from the second source.
trans-unit.target: 在第二个源的数据上执行的处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The third source.
trans-unit.target: 第三个源。

trans-unit.source: The handler to execute on data from the third source.
trans-unit.target: 在第三方源的数据上执行的处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Monitors three dataflow sources, invoking the provided handler for whichever source makes data available first.
trans-unit.target: 监视三种数据流源，调用提供处理程序以使无论哪一种源都可以首先获得数据。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> that represents the asynchronous choice.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示异步选择的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />。

trans-unit.source: If all sources are completed prior to the choice completing, the resulting task will be canceled.
trans-unit.target: 如果在选择完成之前完成所有源，则将取消结果任务。

trans-unit.source: When one of the sources has data available and successfully propagates it to the choice, the resulting task will complete when the handler completes; if the handler throws an exception, the task will end in the <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" /> state and will contain the unhandled exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果源的其中之一具有可利用数据并成功传播到选定内容时，则结果任务将在处理程序完成时完成；如果该处理程序引发异常，则该任务将在 <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" /> 状态下结束并将包含未经处理的异常。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the task will end with its <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1.Result" /> set to the 0-based index of the source.
trans-unit.target: 否则，此任务将以 <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1.Result" /> 设置至源的 0-based 索引结束。

trans-unit.source: This method will only consume an element from one of the data sources, never more than one.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将只使用来自某个数据源的元素（不会超过一种）。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="source1" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source1" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="action1" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="action1" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source2" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source3" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="action3" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="action3" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Specifies type of data contained in the first source.
trans-unit.target: 指定第一个源中所包含的数据的类型。

trans-unit.source: Specifies type of data contained in the second source.
trans-unit.target: 指定第二个源中所包含的数据的类型。

trans-unit.target: 指定第三源中所包含的数据的类型。

trans-unit.target: 第一个源。

trans-unit.target: 在第一个源的数据上执行的处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The second source.
trans-unit.target: 第二个源。

trans-unit.target: 在第二个源的数据上执行的处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The third source.
trans-unit.target: 第三个源。

trans-unit.source: The handler to execute on data from the third source.
trans-unit.target: 在第三方源的数据上执行的处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The options with which to configure this choice.
trans-unit.target: 用来配置此选择的选项。

trans-unit.source: Monitors three dataflow sources, invoking the provided handler for whichever source makes data available first.
trans-unit.target: 监视三种数据流源，调用提供处理程序以使无论哪一种源都可以首先获得数据。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> that represents the asynchronous choice.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示异步选择的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />。

trans-unit.source: If all sources are completed prior to the choice completing, or if the <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" /> provided as part of <paramref name="dataflowBlockOptions" /> is canceled prior to the choice completing, the resulting task will be canceled.
trans-unit.target: 如果在选择完成之前完成所有数据源，或者如果在选择完成之前作为 <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" /> 提供作为 <paramref name="dataflowBlockOptions" /> 一部分提供，则取消结果任务。

trans-unit.source: When one of the sources has data available and successfully propagates it to the choice, the resulting task will complete when the handler completes; if the handler throws an exception, the task will end in the <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" /> state and will contain the unhandled exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果源的其中之一具有可利用数据并成功传播到选定内容时，则结果任务将在处理程序完成时完成；如果该处理程序引发异常，则该任务将在 <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" /> 状态下结束并将包含未经处理的异常。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the task will end with its <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1.Result" /> set to the 0-based index of the source.
trans-unit.target: 否则，此任务将以 <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1.Result" /> 设置至源的 0-based 索引结束。

trans-unit.source: This method will only consume an element from one of the data sources, never more than one.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将只使用来自某个数据源的元素（不会超过一种）。

trans-unit.source: If cancellation is requested after an element has been received, the cancellation request will be ignored, and the relevant handler will be allowed to execute.
trans-unit.target: 如果在接收元素后请求取消，则该取消请求将被忽略并且相关的处理程序将被允许执行。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="source1" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source1" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="action1" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="action1" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="action3" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="dataflowBlockOptions" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dataflowBlockOptions" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of input expected by the target.
trans-unit.target: 指定由目标块接受的应输入的输入类型。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of output produced by the source.
trans-unit.target: 指定由源产生的输出的类型。

trans-unit.source: The target to encapsulate.
trans-unit.target: 要封装的目标。

trans-unit.source: The source to encapsulate.
trans-unit.target: 要封装的源。

trans-unit.source: Encapsulates a target and a source into a single propagator.
trans-unit.target: 将目标和源封装入单一的传播程序。

trans-unit.source: The encapsulated target and source.
trans-unit.target: 封装的目标和源。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowBlock.Encapsulate%2A> method requires two existing blocks: a target block (an instance of a class that implements <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock%601>) and a source block (an instance of a class that implements <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601>).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowBlock.Encapsulate%2A>方法需要两个现有块： 目标块 (实现的类的实例<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock%601>) 和源块 (实现的类的实例<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601>)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowBlock.Encapsulate%2A> creates a new instance of an internal class that connects the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock%601> interface members to the `target` parameter and the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601> interface members to the `source` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowBlock.Encapsulate%2A> 创建连接的内部类的新实例<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock%601>接口成员`target`参数和<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601>接口成员`source`参数。

trans-unit.source: Both <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock%601> and <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601> derive from <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IDataflowBlock>.
trans-unit.target: 同时<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock%601>和<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601>派生自<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IDataflowBlock>。

trans-unit.source: Block completion is explicitly passed from sources to targets.
trans-unit.target: 块完成被显式传递从源到目标。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IDataflowBlock.Complete%2A> and <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IDataflowBlock.Fault%2A> methods are connected to the target while the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IDataflowBlock.Completion%2A> property is connected to the source.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IDataflowBlock.Complete%2A>和<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IDataflowBlock.Fault%2A>方法连接到目标时<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IDataflowBlock.Completion%2A>属性连接到源。

trans-unit.source: You must ensure that when the target half completes, the source half gets completed in the most appropriate manner; for example:
trans-unit.target: 你必须确保当一半完成后的目标一半获取已完成的最合适的方式; 的源例如：

trans-unit.source: Or, if you want to propagate the completion type, you can use this more sophisticated code:
trans-unit.target: 或者，如果你想要传播完成类型，则可以使用此更复杂的代码：

trans-unit.source: You must also explicitly provide the message propagation from target to source.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以显式必须提供从目标到源的消息传播。

trans-unit.source: The benefit of this explicit connection is that it gives you the freedom to perform any unconstrained processing between the two encapsulated blocks.
trans-unit.target: 此显式连接的好处是，它使您可以自由地执行两个封装块之间的任何不受约束的处理。

trans-unit.source: You may do that either by encoding the necessary processing into the blocks' delegates (if the blocks take delegates), or by embedding a sub-network of blocks between them.
trans-unit.target: 你可能会执行该操作通过编码 （如果块接受委托） 的块的委托，到必要的处理或通过嵌入它们之间的块的子网络。

trans-unit.source: The easier way is to use a block that takes delegates; for example, use <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ActionBlock%601>, <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformBlock%602>, <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformManyBlock%602> (if applicable), or a custom block.
trans-unit.target: 更方便的方法是使用一个块，它采用委托;例如，使用<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ActionBlock%601>， <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformBlock%602>， <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformManyBlock%602> （如果适用），或自定义块。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of data contained in the source.
trans-unit.target: 指定源中所包含的数据的类型。

trans-unit.source: The source from which to link.
trans-unit.target: 链接的源。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> to which to connect the source.
trans-unit.target: 该源连接到的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" />。

trans-unit.source: Links the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1" /> to the specified <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1" /> 链接到指定的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IDisposable" /> that, upon calling <see langword="Dispose" />, will unlink the source from the target.
trans-unit.target: 根据调用 <see langword="Dispose" /> 将取消与目标中源的链接的 <see cref="T:System.IDisposable" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="target" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of data contained in the source.
trans-unit.target: 指定源中所包含的数据的类型。

trans-unit.source: The source from which to link.
trans-unit.target: 链接的源。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> to which to connect the source.
trans-unit.target: 要将此源连接到的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" />。

trans-unit.source: The filter a message must pass in order for it to propagate from the source to the target.
trans-unit.target: 在从源传播到目标的过程中消息必须有序通过筛选器。

trans-unit.source: Links the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1" /> to the specified <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> using the specified filter.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的筛选器将 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1" /> 链接到指定的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IDisposable" /> that, upon calling <see langword="Dispose" />, will unlink the source from the target.
trans-unit.target: 根据调用 <see langword="Dispose" /> 将取消与目标中源的链接的 <see cref="T:System.IDisposable" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="target" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="predicate" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="predicate" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of data contained in the source.
trans-unit.target: 指定源中所包含的数据的类型。

trans-unit.source: The source from which to link.
trans-unit.target: 链接的源。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> to which to connect the source.
trans-unit.target: 要将此源连接到的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies how to configure a link between dataflow blocks.
trans-unit.target: 一个枚举值指定如何计算数据流块之间的链接。

trans-unit.source: The filter a message must pass in order for it to propagate from the source to the target.
trans-unit.target: 在从源传播到目标的过程中消息必须有序通过筛选器。

trans-unit.source: Links the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1" /> to the specified <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> using the specified filter.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的筛选器将 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1" /> 链接到指定的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IDisposable" /> that, upon calling <see langword="Dispose" />, will unlink the source from the target.
trans-unit.target: 根据调用 <see langword="Dispose" /> 将取消与目标中源的链接的 <see cref="T:System.IDisposable" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="source" /> is null (Nothing in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 是 null（在 Visual Basic 中为 Nothing）。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="target" /> is null (Nothing in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> 是 null（在 Visual Basic 中为 Nothing）。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="linkOptions" /> is null (Nothing in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="linkOptions" /> 是 null（在 Visual Basic 中为 Nothing）。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="predicate" /> is null (Nothing in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="predicate" /> 是 null（在 Visual Basic 中为 Nothing）。

trans-unit.source: The type of the messages this block can accept.
trans-unit.target: 该块可以接受消息的类型。

trans-unit.source: Gets a target block that synchronously accepts all messages offered to it and drops them.
trans-unit.target: 获取目标块，此目标块能同步接收为其提供的所有信息并放置它们。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> that accepts and subsequently drops all offered messages.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> 接受并后续放置所有提供的信息。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of data contained in the source.
trans-unit.target: 指定源中所包含的数据的类型。

trans-unit.source: The source to monitor.
trans-unit.target: 对监视的源。

trans-unit.source: Provides a <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> that asynchronously monitors the source for available output.
trans-unit.target: 提供可异步监视可利用的输出的源的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> 。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> that informs of whether and when more output is available.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> 通知多个输出是否可用和何时可用。

trans-unit.source: If, when the task completes, its <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1.Result" /> is <see langword="true" />, more output is available in the source (though another consumer of the source may retrieve the data).
trans-unit.target: 如果在任务完成时，它的 <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1.Result" /> 是 <see langword="true" />，更多输出在源处是可用的 (尽管源的另一个使用者可能检索数据)。

trans-unit.source: If it returns <see langword="false" />, more output is not and will never be available, due to the source completing prior to output being available.
trans-unit.target: 如果它返回 <see langword="false" />，则会因为在提供输入之前完成的源而导致更多输出不可用。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of data contained in the source.
trans-unit.target: 指定源中所包含的数据的类型。

trans-unit.source: The source to monitor.
trans-unit.target: 对监视的源。

trans-unit.source: The cancellation token with which to cancel the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 用于取消异步操作的取消标记。

trans-unit.source: Provides a <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> that asynchronously monitors the source for available output.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />，用于以异步方式监视可用输出的源。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> that informs of whether and when more output is available.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> 通知多个输出是否可用和何时可用。

trans-unit.source: If, when the task completes, its <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1.Result" /> is <see langword="true" />, more output is available in the source (though another consumer of the source may retrieve the data).
trans-unit.target: 如果在任务完成时，它的 <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1.Result" /> 是 <see langword="true" />，更多输出在源处是可用的 (尽管源的另一个使用者可能检索数据)。

trans-unit.source: If it returns <see langword="false" />, more output is not and will never be available, due to the source completing prior to output being available.
trans-unit.target: 如果它返回 <see langword="false" />，则会因为在提供输入之前完成的源而导致更多输出不可用。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of data accepted by the target block.
trans-unit.target: 指定由目标块接受的数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The target block.
trans-unit.target: 目标块。

trans-unit.source: The item being offered to the target.
trans-unit.target: 提供给目标的项。

trans-unit.source: Posts an item to the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 将项发送到 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> 中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the item was accepted by the target block; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果项已由目标锁接受，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method will return once the target block has decided to accept or decline the item, but unless otherwise dictated by special semantics of the target block, it does not wait for the item to actually be processed.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将返回后目标块已决定接受或拒绝该项目，但除非否则为由的目标块的特殊语义，它不会等待实际上要处理的项。

trans-unit.source: For example, <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ActionBlock%601> will return from <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowBlock.Post%2A> as soon as it has stored the posted item into its input queue).
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ActionBlock%601>将从返回<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowBlock.Post%2A>一旦它已为其输入队列中存储已发布的项)。

trans-unit.source: From the perspective of the block's processing, `Post` is asynchronous.
trans-unit.target: 从块的处理的角度`Post`是异步的。

trans-unit.source: For target blocks that support postponing offered messages, or for blocks that may do more processing in their `Post` implementation, consider using <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowBlock.SendAsync%2A>, which will return immediately and will enable the target to postpone the posted message and later consume it after `SendAsync` returns.
trans-unit.target: 目标块提供消息，该支持推迟也可能在中执行更多的处理操作的块其`Post`实现，请考虑使用<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowBlock.SendAsync%2A>，它将立即返回，并将使目标都能推迟所发布的消息和更高版本使用之后`SendAsync`返回。

trans-unit.source: The type of data contained in the source.
trans-unit.target: 源中包含的数据的类型。

trans-unit.source: The source from which to receive the value.
trans-unit.target: 从中接收值的源。

trans-unit.source: Synchronously receives a value from a specified source.
trans-unit.target: 同步接收来自指定源的值。

trans-unit.source: The received value.
trans-unit.target: 接收到的值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: No item could be received from the source.
trans-unit.target: 不能从源中接收项。

trans-unit.source: The type of data contained in the source.
trans-unit.target: 源中包含的数据的类型。

trans-unit.source: The source from which to receive the value.
trans-unit.target: 从中接收值的源。

trans-unit.source: The token to use to cancel the receive operation.
trans-unit.target: 用于取消接收操作的标记。

trans-unit.source: Synchronously receives a value from a specified source and provides a token to cancel the operation.
trans-unit.target: 同步从指定的数据源中接收值并提供标记来取消操作。

trans-unit.source: The received value.
trans-unit.target: 接收到的值。

trans-unit.source: If the source successfully offered an item that was received by this operation, that item is returned even if a concurrent cancellation request occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功，源提供收到此操作的项，即使发生并发取消请求，则返回该项。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: No item could be received from the source.
trans-unit.target: 不能从源中接收项。

trans-unit.source: The operation was canceled before an item was received from the source.
trans-unit.target: 在从源接收项目之前被取消的操作。

trans-unit.source: The type of data contained in the source.
trans-unit.target: 源中包含的数据的类型。

trans-unit.source: The source from which to receive the value.
trans-unit.target: 从中接收值的源。

trans-unit.source: The maximum time interval, in milliseconds, to wait for the synchronous operation to complete, or an interval that represents -1 milliseconds to wait indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: 等待同步操作完成的最大时间间隔（以毫秒为单位），或表示 -1 毫秒无限期等待的时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: Synchronously receives a value from a specified source, observing an optional time-out period.
trans-unit.target: 同步从指定的数据源中接收值，观察可选的超时期限。

trans-unit.source: The received value.
trans-unit.target: 接收到的值。

trans-unit.source: If the source successfully offered an item that was received by this operation, that item is returned even if a concurrent time-out occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功，源提供收到此操作的项，即使发生并发超时，则返回该项。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="timeout" /> is a negative number other than -1 milliseconds, which represents an infinite time-out period.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="timeout" /> 是一个非 -1 毫秒的负数，而 -1 表示无限期超时期限。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="timeout" /> is greater than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="timeout" /> 大于 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: No item could be received from the source.
trans-unit.target: 不能从源中接收项。

trans-unit.source: The specified time-out expired before an item was received from the source.
trans-unit.target: 在从源接收到项之前的指定的超时过期。

trans-unit.source: The type of data contained in the source.
trans-unit.target: 源中包含的数据的类型。

trans-unit.source: The source from which to receive the value.
trans-unit.target: 从中接收值的源。

trans-unit.source: The maximum time interval, in milliseconds, to wait for the synchronous operation to complete, or an interval that represents -1 milliseconds to wait indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: 等待同步操作完成的最大时间间隔（以毫秒为单位），或表示 -1 毫秒无限期等待的时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: The token to use to cancel the receive operation.
trans-unit.target: 用于取消接收操作的标记。

trans-unit.source: Synchronously receives a value from a specified source, providing a token to cancel the operation and observing an optional time-out interval.
trans-unit.target: 同步从指定的数据源中接收值，提供标记以取消操作并观察可选的超时间隔。

trans-unit.source: The received value.
trans-unit.target: 接收到的值。

trans-unit.source: If the source successfully offered an item value that was received by this operation, that value is returned even if a concurrent time-out or cancellation request occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功，源提供收到此操作的项值，即使发生并发超时错误或取消请求，则返回该值。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="timeout" /> is a negative number other than -1 milliseconds, which represents an infinite time-out period.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="timeout" /> 是一个非 -1 毫秒的负数，而 -1 表示无限期超时期限。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="timeout" /> is greater than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="timeout" /> 大于 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: No item could be received from the source.
trans-unit.target: 不能从源中接收项。

trans-unit.source: The specified time-out expired before an item was received from the source.
trans-unit.target: 在从源接收到项之前的指定的超时过期。

trans-unit.source: The operation was canceled before an item was received from the source.
trans-unit.target: 在从源接收项目之前被取消的操作。

trans-unit.source: The type of data contained in the source.
trans-unit.target: 源中包含的数据的类型。

trans-unit.source: The source from which to receive the value.
trans-unit.target: 从中接收值的源。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously receives a value from a specified source.
trans-unit.target: 异步接收来自指定源的值。

trans-unit.source: A task that represents the asynchronous receive operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示异步接收操作的任务。

trans-unit.source: When an item value is successfully received from the source, the returned task is completed and its <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1.Result" /> returns the received value.
trans-unit.target: 当从源成功检索出项值时，则返回项的任务将完成，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1.Result" /> 将返回接收的值。

trans-unit.source: If an item value cannot be retrieved because the source is empty and completed , an <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> exception is thrown in the returned task.
trans-unit.target: 如果因为源为空且已完成而无法检索项值，则返回的任务中会引发 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 异常。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of data contained in the source.
trans-unit.target: 指定源中所包含的数据的类型。

trans-unit.source: The source from which to receive the value.
trans-unit.target: 从中接收值的源。

trans-unit.source: The token to use to cancel the receive operation.
trans-unit.target: 用于取消接收操作的标记。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously receives a value from a specified source and provides a token to cancel the operation.
trans-unit.target: 异步从指定的数据源中接收值并提供标记来取消操作。

trans-unit.source: A task that represents the asynchronous receive operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示异步接收操作的任务。

trans-unit.source: When a value is successfully received from the source, the returned task is completed and its <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1.Result" /> returns the value.
trans-unit.target: 当从源成功检索出值时，则返回项的任务将完成，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1.Result" /> 将返回接值。

trans-unit.source: If a value cannot be retrieved because cancellation was requested, the returned task is canceled.
trans-unit.target: 如果因为请求了取消而不能检索值，则返回的任务将被取消。

trans-unit.source: If the value cannot be retrieved because the source is empty and completed , an <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> exception is thrown in the returned task.
trans-unit.target: 如果因为源为空且已完成而无法检索值，则返回的任务中会引发 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 异常。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of data contained in the source.
trans-unit.target: 源中包含的数据的类型。

trans-unit.source: The source from which to receive the value.
trans-unit.target: 从中接收值的源。

trans-unit.source: The maximum time interval, in milliseconds, to wait for the synchronous operation to complete, or an interval that represents -1 milliseconds to wait indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: 等待同步操作完成的最大时间间隔（以毫秒为单位），或表示 -1 毫秒无限期等待的时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously receives a value from a specified source, observing an optional time-out period.
trans-unit.target: 异步从指定的数据源中接收值，观察可选的超时期限。

trans-unit.source: A task that represents the asynchronous receive operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示异步接收操作的任务。

trans-unit.source: When a value is successfully received from the source, the returned task is completed and its <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1.Result" /> returns the value.
trans-unit.target: 当从源成功检索出值时，则返回项的任务将完成，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1.Result" /> 将返回接值。

trans-unit.source: If a value cannot be retrieved because the time-out expired, the returned task is canceled.
trans-unit.target: 如果因为超时已过期而不能检索值，则返回的任务将被取消。

trans-unit.source: If the value cannot be retrieved because the source is empty and completed , an <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> exception is thrown in the returned task.
trans-unit.target: 如果因为源为空且已完成而无法检索值，则返回的任务中会引发 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 异常。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="timeout" /> is a negative number other than -1 milliseconds, which represents an infinite time-out period.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="timeout" /> 是一个非 -1 毫秒的负数，而 -1 表示无限期超时期限。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="timeout" /> is greater than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="timeout" /> 大于 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of data contained in the source.
trans-unit.target: 源中包含的数据的类型。

trans-unit.source: The source from which to receive the value.
trans-unit.target: 从中接收值的源。

trans-unit.source: The maximum time interval, in milliseconds, to wait for the synchronous operation to complete, or an interval that represents -1 milliseconds to wait indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: 等待同步操作完成的最大时间间隔（以毫秒为单位），或表示 -1 毫秒无限期等待的时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: The token which may be used to cancel the receive operation.
trans-unit.target: 可用于取消接收操作的标记。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously receives a value from a specified source, providing a token to cancel the operation and observing an optional time-out interval.
trans-unit.target: 异步从指定的数据源中接收值，提供标记以取消操作并观察可选的超时间隔。

trans-unit.source: A task that represents the asynchronous receive operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示异步接收操作的任务。

trans-unit.source: When a value is successfully received from the source, the returned task is completed and its <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1.Result" /> returns the value.
trans-unit.target: 当从源成功检索出值时，则返回项的任务将完成，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1.Result" /> 将返回接值。

trans-unit.source: If a value cannot be retrieved because the time-out expired or cancellation was requested, the returned task is canceled.
trans-unit.target: 如果因为超时已过期或请求了取消而不能检索值，则返回的任务将被取消。

trans-unit.source: If the value cannot be retrieved because the source is empty and completed, an <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> exception is thrown in the returned task.
trans-unit.target: 如果因为源为空且已完成而无法检索值，则返回任务中会引发 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 异常。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="timeout" /> is a negative number other than -1 milliseconds, which represents an infinite time-out period.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="timeout" /> 是一个非 -1 毫秒的负数，而 -1 表示无限期超时期限。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="timeout" /> is greater than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="timeout" /> 大于 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of the data to post to the target.
trans-unit.target: 指定发送到目标的数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The target to which to post the data.
trans-unit.target: 要发送数据的目标。

trans-unit.source: The item being offered to the target.
trans-unit.target: 提供给目标的项。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously offers a message to the target message block, allowing for postponement.
trans-unit.target: 为目标消息块异步提供消息，允许延期。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> that represents the asynchronous send.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示异步发送的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />。

trans-unit.source: If the target accepts and consumes the offered element during the call to <see cref="M:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowBlock.SendAsync``1(System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock{``0},``0)" />, upon return from the call the resulting <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> will be completed and its <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1.Result" /> property will return <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目标在调用 <see cref="M:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowBlock.SendAsync``1(System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock{``0},``0)" /> 时接受并使用提供的元素，在调用返回时<see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> 将被完成，并且它的 <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1.Result" /> 属性将返回 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If the target declines the offered element during the call, upon return from the call the resulting <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> will be completed and its <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1.Result" /> property will return <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目标在调用过程中拒绝提供的元素，则在调用返回时 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> 将被完成，并且它的<see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1.Result" /> 属性将返回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the target postpones the offered element, the element will be buffered until such time that the target consumes or releases it, at which point the task will complete, with its <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1.Result" /> indicating whether the message was consumed.
trans-unit.target: 如果目标将提供的要素推迟，则该要素将被缓存，直到目标使用它或将其释放。此时任务宣告完成，<see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1.Result" /> 表明消息是否被使用。

trans-unit.source: If the target never attempts to consume or release the message, the returned task will never complete.
trans-unit.target: 如果目标从不尝试使用或释放消息，则返回的任务将无法完成。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="target" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of the data to post to the target.
trans-unit.target: 指定发送到目标的数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The target to which to post the data.
trans-unit.target: 要发送数据的目标。

trans-unit.source: The item being offered to the target.
trans-unit.target: 提供给目标的项。

trans-unit.source: The cancellation token with which to request cancellation of the send operation.
trans-unit.target: 用于请求取消发送操作的取消标记。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously offers a message to the target message block, allowing for postponement.
trans-unit.target: 为目标消息块异步提供消息，允许延期。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> that represents the asynchronous send.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示异步发送的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />。

trans-unit.source: If the target accepts and consumes the offered element during the call to SendAsync, upon return from the call the resulting <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> will be completed and its <c>Result</c> property will return true.
trans-unit.target: 如果目标在调用 SendAsync 时接受并使用提供的元素，在调用返回时将完成得到的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />，并且它的 <c>Result</c> 属性将返回 true。

trans-unit.source: If the target declines the offered element during the call, upon return from the call the resulting <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> will be completed and its <c>Result</c> property will return false.
trans-unit.target: 如果目标在调用过程中拒绝提供的元素， 则在调用返回时将完成得到的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />，并且其 <c>Result</c> 属性将返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: If the target postpones the offered element, the element will be buffered until such time that the target consumes or releases it, at which point the Task will complete, with its <c>Result</c> indicating whether the message was consumed.
trans-unit.target: 如果目标将提供的要素推迟，则该要素将被缓存，直到目标使用它或将其释放。此时任务宣告完成，<c>Result</c> 表明消息是否被使用。

trans-unit.source: If the target never attempts to consume or release the message, the returned task will never complete.
trans-unit.target: 如果目标从不尝试使用或释放消息，则返回的任务将无法完成。

trans-unit.source: If cancellation is requested before the target has successfully consumed the sent data, the returned task will complete in the Canceled state and the data will no longer be available to the target.
trans-unit.target: 如果在目标成功使用已发送的数据之前取消请求，则返回的任务将在“已取消”状态下完成，并且数据不再对目标可用。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="target" /> is null (Nothing in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> 是 null（在 Visual Basic 中为 Nothing）。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of data contained in the source.
trans-unit.target: 指定源中所包含的数据的类型。

trans-unit.source: The source from which to receive.
trans-unit.target: 要从中进行接收的源。

trans-unit.source: The item received from the source.
trans-unit.target: 从源中检索到的项。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to synchronously receive an item from the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 尝试从 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1" /> 中同步接收一个项目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if an item could be received; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以接收项，则为 <see langword="true" />，否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method does not wait until the source has an item to provide.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不会等到源中包含的项提供。

trans-unit.source: It will return whether or not an element was available.
trans-unit.target: 它将返回一个元素可用。
